mapper.select: SELECT rt.*, ob.name AS origin_bank_name, db.name AS destination_bank_name FROM receipt_transfer rt LEFT JOIN bank ob ON rt.origin_bank_id = ob.id LEFT JOIN bank db ON rt.destination_bank_id = db.id WHERE rt.receipt_id = #{receiptId} AND rt.receipt_type = #{receiptType} ORDER BY rt.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO receipt_transfer ( receipt_id, receipt_type, origin_account, origin_bank_id, destination_account, destination_bank_id, reference, amount, created_at ) VALUES ( #{receiptId}, #{receiptType}, #{originAccount}, #{originBankId}, #{destinationAccount}, #{destinationBankId}, #{reference}, #{amount}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
